entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
